data.rec_desc: The burger is a custom blend of ground prime rib, brisket, skirt steak and tenderloin, topped with Nueske’s bacon and Cowgirl Creamery’s triple-cream Mt. Tam cheese. The recipe is also delicious with a mix of chuck and sirloin.
data.addon_sub_title: Roma Tomatoes, Red Onions, Kalamata Olives...

data.rec_title: Umami Burgers with Port and Stilton
data.rec_desc: Resist the urge to pile on any of the usual toppings—lettuce, tomato, ketchup. “The port is your condiment,” explains Adam Fleischman.
data.addon_sub_title: Roma Tomatoes, Red Onions, Kalamata Olives...

data.rec_desc: This delectable blue cheese burger is a best seller at The Hungry Cat, in Hollywood.
data.addon_sub_title: Roma Tomatoes, Red Onions, Kalamata Olives...

data.rec_desc: Resist the urge to pile on any of the usual toppings—lettuce, tomato, ketchup. “The port is your condiment,” explains Adam Fleischman.
data.addon_sub_title: Roma Tomatoes, Red Onions, Kalamata Olives...

data.rec_desc: Minetta Tavern’s namesake burger is made with a blend of beef short rib and brisket from the nearly century-old local purveyor Pat La Frieda.
data.addon_sub_title: Roma Tomatoes, Red Onions, Kalamata Olives...

data.rec_desc: Inspired by the sliders at White Manna in Hackensack, New Jersey, Adam Fleischman creates beef patties by flattening balls of ground meat on the griddle. Tip: Burger purists handle ground meat as little as possible; over-working the beef can create a tight, meatloaf texture.
data.addon_sub_title: Roma Tomatoes, Red Onions, Kalamata Olives...

data.rec_title: Cheddar BLT Burgers with Tarragon Russian Dressing
data.rec_desc: Chef Laurent Tourondel brushes burgers with butter while they’re on the grill. The natural sugars caramelize, making the meat extra-delicious.
data.addon_sub_title: Roma Tomatoes, Red Onions, Kalamata Olives...

data.rec_desc: The Neapolitan pizza is the original pizza that left Italy and arrived with Italian immigrants in the United States.
